abstract: Goalie Tim Howard hopes to return to United States men's soccer team in time for upcoming exhibition match against Peru; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Tim Howard said he was ready to make himself available for the United States national team after taking a break since the 2014 World Cup.

headline.main: Tim Howard May Return to U.S. National Team
headline.print_headline: Howard May Return to National Team

snippet: Goalkeeper Tim Howard said he was ready to make himself available for the United States national team after taking a break since the 2014 World Cup.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
